mapper.select: select * from tab_inventory where warehouseID = #{warehouseID} and cargoID = #{cargoID} and amount > #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into tab_inventory( warehouseID,cargoID,amount, creator,creattime,modifier,modifytime) values( #{warehouseID},#{cargoID},#{amount}, #{creator},#{creattime},#{modifier},#{modifytime})
mapper.update: update tab_inventory set warehouseID = #{warehouseID}, cargoID = #{cargoID}, amount = #{amount}, creator = #{creator}, creattime = #{creattime}, modifier = #{modifier}, modifytime = #{modifytime} where inventoryID = #{inventoryID}
update tab_inventory set amount = amount + #{amount} where warehouseID = #{warehouseID} and cargoID = #{cargoID}
